name: Actirumia
description:
Fight against enemies by summoning tornadoes, earthquakes and waves and bring back the powerstones to save Actirumia.  Play with sounds on for the best experience.

Actirumia was made in 5 days for the Brackeys Game Jam 2021.2. 

Controls
  • Move: WASD / Arrow Keys
  • Summon natural disasters: Space / LMB
  • Choose natural disaster: Left shift key / RMB
Known bugs 
  • The pathfinding of the enemies isn't the best and they sometimes get stuck.
